TransactionStateContext.CollectionState: When Ether is sent to the contract via the fallback function, it is stored in the contract balance.
TransactionStateContext.WithdrawalState: The withdrawAll function allows the owner to withdraw all Ether from the contract.

ExternalInteractions.EtherTransfers: The contract interacts with the Ethereum blockchain to accept and store Ether sent to it and to transfer Ether to the recipient via withdrawAll.
